body_html:
The build was broken due to the changes in the upstream (191658d). It is a bit confusing that testing is performed after merging with upstream, though, quite reasonable.

I updated pooling with doubles to call new cudnn loading mechanism. So build should be successful now. @vrv Can you rerun tests again?

body:
The build was broken due to the changes in the upstream (191658d54f90ac03c15b339326129cd52d1f56a3). It is a bit confusing that testing is performed after merging with upstream, though, quite reasonable.

I updated pooling with doubles to call new cudnn loading mechanism. So build should be successful now. @vrv Can you rerun tests again?
